title: What are the best video streaming technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The key technical goals that should be considered for a seamless live streaming: Near-real-time: The delay between the actual real-life event and the time the user perceives it —the latency— should be minimum for the interaction to be smooth.Universality: The applications should be deployable under as many platforms, systems and networks and as easily as possible.Security: The applications should be secure.Frame rate: The higher the better.Quality: The higher the better.Network bandwidth usage: The lower the better.Client-side resources: CPU and RAM usage. The lower the better.Server-side processing: CDNHigh-compression formatsVideo System Video ingest : RTMP streamingTranscode system: Intake RTMP stream from the broadcaster, and transcode it into multiple HLS streams. This is implemented via a combination of C/C++, and Go.Distribution and Edge : Distribute the HLS streams to our geographically disparate..VOD (Video on Demand): they have their own VOD system.Web APIs and Data Besides the real-time services (video and chat) they also have substantial services like: Web APIsSearch and Discovery services that help you to find the streams that you want.Revenue systemsAdministrative tools that help our support staff resolve your problems.This is all built on a mix of Rails, Go, and various different open-source applications that are used for routing, caching, and data storage. Web and Client Applications Our desktop web application, which started off as a vanilla Rails application.Native apps for the major mobile and tablet platforms (iOS and Android).Various console applications, including XBox One, XBox 360 and Playstation 4.Data Science Infrastructure These systems include: The data pipeline, which collects, cleans, and loads over a billion events a day into our data warehouseStreaming aggregates to summarize metrics in near real-time for broadcasters.Please refer to this beginner’s guide on how to start a Live Streaming website.

Video streaming is a vast domain and need specialization in various areas. Stating some of them below: Infrastructure: This comprises of hardware & softwareThe hardware today is mostly cloud based services such as Amazon’s AWS, Microsoft’s Azure & Google’s Cloud.The software binds all components together and this broadly comprises of algorithms & protocols such as DASH (Dynamic Adaptive Streaming over HTTP) & RTMPSecurity: You need to know Digital Rights Management or simply DRM and Digital WatermarkingPlayer: Need to have a player supported modern browsers, basically an HTML5 supported player.
